text: @narendramodi @BJP4India @Tejasvi_Surya Sir this is very painful that every time Karnataka is in least or nt bothered. could hv released covid19 relief fund evn for Karnataka people.we would hv been thankful. it is very sad that we giving full majority for BJP rule here without any benefits.
